summary: SummaryMediheal Vita Collagen Eye Ampoule Patch is a hydrogel infused with vitamin + collagen ampoule. It helps brighten dark circles and deliver a refreshed, revitalized feel.
details: DetailsBenefitsDeeply hydrates and brightens tired-looking eyesSmooths and firms for a refreshed, youthful appearanceHelps reduce puffiness and fine linesKey Ingredients7 Types of Vitamins: help brighten dull skin, improve skin tone, and deliver antioxidant benefits to the delicate eye area5 Collagen Types: replenish and firm from deep within to improve elasticity and reduce the look of fine linesResearch ResultsEffective in improving dark spots around the eyes, including freckles, melasma, and hyperpigmentation.Improved under-eye (eye bag) volume by 16.47%.Dual-action formula: Brightening and visibly firms.Item 2640454How To UseAfter cleansing and toning unfold a patch using the built-in spatula. Apply patches under each eye and leave them for 20-30 minutes. Remove patches and gently pat remaining essence into the skin.Tip: Patches can be applied onto different areas of the face. (mouth lines, forehead, neck)IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Carrageenan, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Hippophae Rhamnoides Water, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Pyridoxine HCl, Tocopheryl Acetate, Thiamine HCl, Riboflavin, Menadione, Calcium Pantothenate, Collagen, Hydrolyzed Extensin, Collagen Extract, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Soluble Collagen, Sodium Hyaluronate, Madecassoside, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Allantoin, Calcium Chloride, Cellulose Gum, Panthenol, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Potassium Chloride, Propanediol, Maltodextrin, Sodium Starch Octenylsuccinate, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Butylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Calcium Lactate, Sucrose, Adenosine, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Titanium Dioxide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium EDTA, Arginine, CI 77492, Polyglyceryl-10 Oleate, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Silica.
how_to_use: After cleansing and toning unfold a patch using the built-in spatula. Apply patches under each eye and leave them for 20-30 minutes. Remove patches and gently pat remaining essence into the skin.Tip: Patches can be applied onto different areas of the face. (mouth lines, forehead, neck)

reviews.headline: Softens wrinkles on my 38 yo face
reviews.comments: I LOVE these things! They're a nice, large size so I can position them to cover both my undereye and my crows' feet. I choose to wear them overnight and when I wake up I don't have creases and wrinkles from side sleeping. I've noticed a reduction in the fine lines under my eyes. In regards to the reviewed who mentioned pilling, I personally haven't found a collagen product that doesn't do that (including famous brands) I would suggest using them at night and not before makeup. I hope that helps!

reviews.headline: brightening
reviews.comments: i do notice the difference, my under eyes have been less dull.

reviews.headline: Too slippery and pills!
reviews.comments: The serum is best overnight to fully absorb, otherwise it pills so much!! Looks like Vaseline balling up and off of my face throughout the day. The formula just needs a bit more work, I wanted to love it, but can't even return since I tossed the package :(
